Therefore , need exists effective blood pressure reduction program target toward youth . However , effect stress anger management program blood pressure level youth widely study . Study researcher develop preliminarily test school-based anger stress management WLS program . This study evaluate effectiveness school-based WLS program reduce blood pressure anger level high school student . If successful , program could implement school across country . This study enroll high school student . Participants randomly assign either 12 lesson WLS program control group . Participants control group attend regular high school class . Participants WLS program attend 12 session focus cop skill help manage stress anger level . At baseline , end 12 lesson program , follow-up visit 3 6 month later , participant complete questionnaire anger level ; life skill ; hostility ; stress ; self-esteem ; attitude toward school , teacher , parent . They also wear blood pressure monitor 24-hour period .
